title: Bungaku Shoujo Short Stories from DVD
sinopse:
Short Stories that included in Limited Editions of Bungaku Shoujo Movie and Memoire DVDs.

Bungaku Shoujo Heian-hen Kakitsuzuru Boku to Yomigataru Kanojo - Bungaku Shoujo Movie
Mermaid wa Amai Romance ga Suki - Memoire I
Snow Queen wa Ai wo Yurusanai - Memoire II
Belle wa Tsun to Kao wo Somukeru - Memoire III
